messages.content: What is the purpose of the Chunk Up node?
Splits the input list or batch into chunks of the specified size. This is useful in combination with loops to process large lists in smaller chunks.
How can the Get chunk node be used?
Gets the chunk at the specified index from the input list. The index input can be attached to the remaining output of a loop.
What is the function of the Join Chunks node?
Joins a chunk and a batch, and produces the combined results.
How does the Model from URL node work?
Downloads a model from the specified URL to the output folder and outputs its filename. It checks for existing files to prevent duplicate downloads.
Explain the purpose of the Inspect node.
Prints the input to the console. This is primarily used for debugging purposes.
Describe the function of the Any String node.
Outputs the input string regardless of its type. Useful for specifying additional data inputs that aren't merely strings.
